alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:29AM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the Wind River Basin; 3 to 5 inches in the Lander Foothills. Wind gusting as high as 35 mph, mainly north of Riverton. * WHERE...Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Sunday. The steadiest and heaviest snow will occur this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
